aitools.configuration.maxSpeedMultiplier: The maximum speed multiplier for the AI Tools.
aitools.configuration.maxRadiusLevel.too: The maximum mining radius level for the AI Tools. The radius is calculated as (2 * radiusLevel + 1).
aitools.configuration.maxFortuneLevel.to: The maximum fortune level for the AI Tools.
aitools.configuration.maxEfficiencyLevel: The maximum efficiency level for the AI Tools.
aitools.configuration.title: AI Tools Configuration
